turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Hey doll, I need a Venti White Mocha from Starbucks.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Of course! The one on Prospect?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Of course!!!

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Do you want standard or a quad shot?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Quad shot please, it's going to be a long evening.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: I thought so. Glad I asked.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Go ahead and add some Caramel Drizzle as well.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Feeling peckish?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: It's that or actual dinner.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: *Laughs* The horror.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: The worst.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Okay. I'm on my way ETA 15 minutes, doesn't look like the line is long.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Go ahead and get something for yourself as well, you have my card.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Thanks boss, do you need anything else?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Actually. Go ahead and get a venti, quad, iced, no ice, caramel macchiato upside down as well.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Well that's a mouthful.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: True to form. Make that two, you have to try it and worst case I can never be "too caffeinated".

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: So wait, am I getting three drinks or four?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Four, 2 quad, venti, iced, no ice, upside down, caramel macchiatos, a venti quad white chocolate mocha with caramel drizzle and whatever you want.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Alright, thanks again, I'm in line, see you soon.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Thanks doll, drive safe.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Will do! Bye!

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Bye!
